short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of online distractions? Get over your browsing addiction and Increase Productivity!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever find yourself ending up on sites that you were not supposed to be on? Now you can block such sites so you can focus on the things that matter. Not only that!! We know that your carving doesn't stop here, so we added a feature to help you block by words too!!!
Features:
>Block sites by words
>Block sites by URL
Note: This item uses the page's URL to block that page. So try to be more specific if some non-listed sites end up getting blocked!!
